name: Hyprr
public_notice: Howdoo is rebranded to Hyprr. Find more details in their announcement. They have recently migrated from old contract to new contract.

description.en: Hyprr Ecosystem, fuelled by the uDOO token, brings a blockchain, Governance token, nodes, HowdooSwap and Howdoo LaunchPad.

ico_data.short_desc: Howdoo is a messaging and social media platform that offers greater choice and control to users.
